text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Ah! I found it at last! This will makethe perfect present! Hrngh!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, it won't break off. It looks so<n>cool too... I never saw an
icicle as big<n>as a bear.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Oh well, I guess it'd melt anyway.<n>Santa wouldn't choose
that... Hm,<n>gotta start over. Something within...<n>But not in
my clothes. I didn't find<n>anything there.
Marvelous! ☆★

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Kyahaha! Try to be smoother,<n>Mayano! And do it more
marvelously!<n>☆★

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Marvelously? You got it! Saucy-licious<n>maverick snowball,
taking off! ♪

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Eek! That's cold! But now I'm all hot!<n>☆ How strange and
fantastic! ★ Winter<n>is truly marvelous! ☆★

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: It is getting hot! I need to take mycoat off. ♪ Hahaha! ☆

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: You two...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's Oguri! Hi, Oguri! ♪

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: A marvelous day to you! ☆

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Hello. What are you doing? Did you<n>come all the way out
here for a<n>snowball fight?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
No, no! If you really wanna know...<n>we're looking for a
miracle!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: You are?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Yes! ♪ 'Tis the season that's most<n>full of them! ☆ Sparkly
ones, exciting<n>ones, and especially marvelous ones!<n>★

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! We managed to find this place<n>using Marvey's
marvelous sixth<n>sense and my instincts. ♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
And would ya look at all the snow!<n>It's more fun than we
could wish for!<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano & Marvelous
text_block_list.text: Yippee! ♪

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
So that's it. Both your intuitions are<n>incredible. You're right
that there are<n>lots of miracles on snowy mountains.<n>I just
saw an icicle as big as a grizzly.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Wooow! That's super awesome! And<n>we just saw a giant
sleigh that<n>crashed down!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
A sleigh! That's a must-have in<n>winter! One of those can
carry so<n>much food! Where was it? I want to<n>see too!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: We'd be happy to show you, but are<n>you sure?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
I see a hazy purplish blue around<n>you... Is it food? The
sparkles in it look<n>so tasty I'm getting dizzy. ☆

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Tasty-looking sparkles? It can't be<n>snow. That's not food. I
got in trouble<n>once for eating it like shaved ice...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you got scolded, huh? No, wait!<n>What Marvey's asking
is if you're in<n>some kinda trouble!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Ah, that's right! Actually...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I see now. So you wanna be Santa? ♪<n>That's so sweet! ☆

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
But I don't know what the right<n>present would be... I just
can't<n>imagine one, no matter how hard I<n>think.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Hrmmm... ☆ Say, Oguri! That outfit<n>you're wearing...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Oh, my fans gave this to me as a<n>present. They put all this
effort into it<n>to give me an extra boost...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I can really feel their hearts in it.<n>That's why... I have to give
a present<n>back, something only I can give.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ...Oh, I think I might know what to do!<n>☆

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Ah, is it super sparkly and<n>marvelous? I think we thought of
the<n>same thing! ☆★

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Nice, Marvey! It really is the only<n>option here, right? ♪

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Uh... Something marvelous? What<n>could that be? You've got
to tell me!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: The thing you just have to do is...you've gotta really become Santa! ☆

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: But... what do you mean?

text_block_list.name: Mayano & Marvelous
text_block_list.text: Exactly what you think! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Gurrrgle...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, my stomach... It must be dinner<n>time soon. That means
the party's<n>about to start!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
You two! Thanks for the help! I'll try<n>to become Santa and
see what<n>happens!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ...Hey, Marvey. I've got a proposal<n>for you.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Ah! Me too! It'd be really fun if we...<n>follow Oguri, right? ☆

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
You know it, Marvey! Change of flight<n>path! We're going
after Oguri—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Tweet, tweet...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hngh! I'm coooold!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Wooow... ☆ It's snowiiiing! ★
